# Load Packages

```{r}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Load Data

```{r}
planet_grids = st_read("../ARTS_planet_basemaps/data/circumpolar_global_basemap_grids.geojson")
ab_region = st_read("../../tundra_and_boreal_domain/tundra_and_boreal.shp") |>
  st_make_valid()
```

# Filter Planet Grids to Arctic Boreal Region

```{r}
ab_planet_grids = planet_grids |>
  mutate(
    year = name |>
      str_match("[:digit:]{4}") |>
      as.numeric()
  ) |>
  filter(year == 2017) |>
  st_filter(
    ab_region
  ) |>
  select(id)
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(
    data = ab_planet_grids,
    fill = "transparent"
  )
```
